name: set_project
description: Set the cargo project root by pointing to Cargo.toml and list available crates

name: crate_info
description: Get basic information about a crate

crate.description: Name of the crate (optional, defaults to project root)

name: list_items_by_kind
description: List all items of a specific kind (e.g., 'function', 'struct', 'trait')

kind.description: The kind of items to list

crate.description: Name of the crate (optional, defaults to project root)

limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: 50)

crate.description: Name of the crate (optional, defaults to project root)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 20)

name: get_item_details
description: Get detailed information about a specific item by ID

id.description: The ID of the item to retrieve

crate.description: Name of the crate (optional, defaults to project root)

detailed.description: Include detailed information about sub-items (fields, variants, methods) (default: false)

include_impls.description: Include implementation details and methods (default: false)

name: kind_statistics
description: Get statistics about item kinds in a crate

crate.description: Name of the crate (optional, defaults to project root)
